duties_responsibilities.duty: Respond and take actions to incidents and requests regarding storage in DELFI Petrotechnical Suite (PTS)
Perform routine maintenance tasks on storage in DELFI PTS
Verify backups are successfully run for storage solutions in DELFI PTS
Liaise with internal DELFI PTS teams on DELFI PTS Storage related subjects
Suggest and/or write playbooks as needed for continuous improvement

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
